entry.title: Lost_Weekend - After Midnight - 가사
entry.content:
why don't you meet me after midnight
for a nightcap at my place
leave our lives behind us
another time, a different face

you say hello how do you do
there's no one as fine, as fine as you
the moon will rise and my stomach will turn
the stars catch fire and we burn burn burn

why don't you meet me after midnight
spin some tunes and dance all night
cos I'm tulip to your jesse
highway racing till it's light

you'll say until the world would end
and the sky it breaks from a space time bend
the moon will rise and my stomach will turn
the stars catch fire and we burn burn burn

the world would close around me
your voice would almost drown me

why don't you meet me after midnight
she'll never know, I promise you
but when she turns her head and reaches
for a flurry of your kisses

entry.title: Lost_Weekend - Wild Ones - 가사
entry.content:
my baby just runs and runs he's never standing still
and none of these chains of yours could keep us against our will
sharper than knives, hotter than coals
our home is our hearth and our hearth is the open road

well take it from me he's a wild one
take it from me he's a wild one
yeah take it from me he's a wild one

my baby stole fire from the gods with the devil close behind
he stole the thunder from the clouds and split open the sky
we're dancing in liquor stores, we're riding in stolen cars
and over the horizon all you'll see is a burning star

give me a taste of your danger
and you know i'll be coming over

love is a violent song and we die a little bit each day

entry.title: Lost_Weekend - What Do You Call It - 가사

link.title: Lost_Weekend - What Do You Call It - 가사

entry.content:
what do you call it
when you let the phone go on
ringing a bit longer than is right
when it makes the most sense
to hurt you out of spite
when all I want to do
is set this place alight
what do you call it

it's scary but your hand don't fit in mine no more
i love you but i don't like you anymore

how would you put it
well I would say
it's a glacier primed to collapse
or the death of a star perhaps
but how would you put it
it's the beginning of an end
of a wasteful drunken bend

the lights go on, and the credits roll
we exit left to this hellhole

it's scary but your hand don't fit in mine no more
i love you but i don't like you anymore

the lights go on, and the credits roll
we exit left to this hellhole
in the dark without a light
we're two ships passing in the night

i loved you but your hand don't fit in mine no more
i loved you but now you're showing me the door

entry.title: Lost_Weekend - On A Sunday - 가사
entry.content:
market mothers
bring your children out on a sunday afternoon
to see the fish and the veg
and the stalls in the wet market now

football fathers
bring your children home on a sunday night
to see the boys in the match
and hope he wins his bets

on a sunday
everything moves so slow
on a sunday
standing in monday's shadow
oh sunday's
always come too soon

cartoon noises
coming through the walls on a sunday morning
don't wake me from my sleep
but i don't mind because the sound is sweet

neighbours screaming
but they're waving when you step outside
on a day like today
you smile but don't know what to say

entry.title: Lost_Weekend - Mornings - 가사
entry.content:
lying awake on my bed
i can hear my heart beating
and i still taste the sweetest wine in my veins

and i was a saint
until i was introduced to sin
now everything i touch is stained

and how the moonlight drives me crazy
and how the streetlight keeps me sane
and how the nights are always hazy
and mornings i memorize my name

lying awake in my bed
i can hear the birds are singing
but i can feel the night in my bloodshot veins

and i was a child
until i was introduced to shame
and i am old but i never learnt to abstain

and everything's unsteady
feeling so unready
so give it to me easy now

and everything's unsteady
in a dream so heady
so baby give it to me easy now
